column1: barbara ann johnson| barbara ann johnson
column8: 1934 to james and barbara (fitzgerald) morse in superior
column9: wi. she was married to lloyd johnson on february 18
column11: wi. barbara worked many years at the barron extended care nursing home as a nursing assistant. barbara is survived by her brother: bill morse of barron
column12: wi. she is preceded in death by her parents
column14: brother: joseph and sister: mary. a service for barbara will be held on thursday
column16: 2015 at 2:00 pm at monroe manor in barron
column17: wi with rev. frank distad officiating. visitation will be a half an hour (1/2) prior to services at monroe manor. burial will be at wayside cemetery in barron
column18: wi. arrangements are being handled by rausch & steel funeral home in barron
column19: wi. online condolences can be made at www. rauschandsteelfuneralhome. com.
